title: How to make a Tag in Tag Manager
body:
You may notice this feature has a new look and feel, we hope you love it as much as we do!
MediRecords is dedicated to providing our customers with the best experience possible by undergoing a product refresh to respond to user research, market trends and customer feedback. We are excited to introduce MediRecords 2.0 to our customers, so please stay tuned for more to come.
  To make a tag you must first navigate to the Tag Manager where you are able to create, edit and view all tags within a tenant. You must be a practice owner in Security Settings to have access to this screen. Once you are in the Tag Manager follow the below steps: 
  1. Click 'Create Tag' in the top right-hand corner 
2. A screen will appear where you must enter the name and colour of the tag 
  3. Once the essential information is entered and you click save, you will have created a new tag!
  For urgent assistance, please contact MediRecords support on 1300 103 903 during business hours.
